ygData.subject: Another guild...
ygData.msgSnippet: Okies here s tha deal. I am AGM of a guild called COG (Council Of Grey) and many of you who have played NwN will remember us. I want to start a faction of COG
ygData.messageBody:
Okies here's tha deal. I am AGM of a guild called COG (Council Of Grey) and
many of you who have played NwN will remember us. I want to start a faction
of COG in EQ, so if anyone is interested, just reply to this email. We
currently have a COG faction in 4 online games, and another possible once it
opens. We are a neutral guild believing in balance of everything. Therefore
all races are accepted, and all classes. We have our own web-based message
board, as well as an email mailing list. Let me know,
COG Jynxx
~AGM~
Council Of Grey
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Tyveris,
Aspiring Samurai
